EmailTemplate.description: Email template for sending license keys to customer
EmailTemplate.name: X_DEPRECATED_Neo4J Send Trial License Key To Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!License_Key__c.Registrant__c}, Congratulations on choosing the Neo4j graph database platform! Your trial activation key for {!License_Key__c.Feature__c} is attached to this email. You will need the activation key during the installation process. This key is set to expire on {!License_Key__c.Expiration_Date__c}. Please refer to Neo4j documentation (https://neo4j.com/docs) or the Neo4j Bloom getting started guide (https://bit.ly/2zdfHeW) for detailed instructions.
Should you have any questions, please reach out to your Neo4j point of contact {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Name__c} at {!License_Key__c.Sales_Rep_Email__c}. Best Regards, Neo4j Licensing Team
